name: unfoldEffect
signature: <S, A, E, R>(s: S, f: (s: S) => Effect<Option<readonly [A, S]>, E, R>) => Stream<A, E, R>
description:
Creates a stream by effectfully peeling off the "layers" of a value of type
`S`.
documentation:
